title: PA-16-02: Release of OGE’s Public Financial Disclosure Guide
url: https://www.oge.gov/Web/oge.nsf/Legal Docs/87659636006E5E77852585BA005BEC5F/$FILE/PA- Public Financial Disclosure Guide Release - Final.pdf?open
summary: This program advisory announces the release of the new web-based Public Financial Disclosure Guide for filers and reviewers of the OGE Form 278e and the OGE Form 278-T.
